name: Chana Chaat Recipe | Zarnak Sidhwa | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chana Chaat Recipe: Chickpeas 50 gm Dark brown peas 50 gm Chopped tomato 1 Potato (boiled & chopped) 1 Boiled green peas 50 gm Salt to taste Chopped onion 1 Red chilli powder 2 tbsp Green chilli 1 Chaat masala 1 tsp Fried garlic 2 cloves Mint chutney 1 tsp Sesame seeds 2 tsp Lemon juice Tamarind pulp 2 tsp Chopped spring onion 1
instructions: In a large bowl, mix all the ingredients. Garnish and serve.
